thread.title: Yolanda Hadid is selling her LA condo to move to NYC | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Yolanda Hadid is selling her LA condo to move to NYC | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.Com Reporter
title: Yolanda Hadid is selling her LA condo to move to NYC | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 79 shares The doting mom has decided to put her Los Angeles condo up for $5 million, although she doesn't have a place yet to live in the city, both Gigi and Bella have condos in some of the nicest areas in Manhattan. Yolanda originally bought the condo for $4.59 million just over a year ago after selling the Malibu mansion she lived in with David Foster for $27.5 million. Her family is there! Both Bella and Gigi have made the city home while they pursue their wildly successful modeling careers and now Anwar is spending time there modeling as well Lap of luxury: Yolanda and David put a lot of money and effort into their Malibu pad before selling it in 2015 Gorgous digs: The $27.5 million mansion boasted six bedrooms and nine bathrooms After the two separated, Yolanda downsized from the gorgeous mansion that boasted six-bedrooms and nine-bathrooms home and even had a glass refrigerator. Since 2015, Yolanda has been living in a condo at The Carlyle Residences, which has amazing view of the Los Angeles skyline. The condo has plenty of natural lighting thanks to the wide and generous windows found in practically every room. LA condo: Since 2015, Yolanda has been living in a condo at The Carlyle Residences, which boasted amazing view of the Los Angeles skyline Even the bathroom, which was complete with a spacious spa-like bathtub, was equipped with unparalleled views of the city. The dining room had a glittering chandelier and plenty of room, perfect for entertaining in front of its roaring fireplace. The Carlyle offers a private elevator entrance into every unit, a wine cellar, and 'white glove' concierge services available 24 hours a day, according to it's website. The Carlyle offers a private elevator entrance into every unit, a wine cellar, and 'white glove' concierge services available 24 hours a day, according to it's website Multiple bedrooms: The condo boasted three bedrooms that she no longer needs since her children live in NYc Making a few bucks: Yolanda is selling the condo for $5 million after she bought it for $4.59 million At the time Yolanda posted a photo of the new place on Instagram, captioning it: 'Sometimes what you are most afraid of doing is the very thing that will set you free #WindowsToMyWorld #Home #NewBeginnings' Yolanda's previous place of residence was the lavish, multimillion dollar home in Malibu that she shared with her estranged husband, David Foster. The couple announced they were calling it quits in early December 2015. Yolanda is mother to three children from her previous marriage to Mohamed Hadid: Gigi, 20, Bella, 19, and Anwar, 16. Master bedroom: Even the bathroom, which was complete with a spacious spa-like bathtub, was equipped with unparalleled views of the city. Light and airy: The condo has plenty of natural lighting thanks to the wide and generous windows found in practically every room NYC gal: The former Real Housewives of Beverly Hills star has already been spending quite a bit of time in the eastern city Read more: Share or comment on this article 79
